Validation.Description: Define approval conditions for an Item which requires age verification
Validates that a manager has confirmed the called authorization code was entered properly.
Define approval conditions when external validation disallows a coupon.
Define Item Quantity override for Coupons.
Define override rules when Coupon minimum purchase condition is not satisfied.

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Integer" Name="CouponGracePeriodInDays" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define number of days within which expired coupon may be used.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="CPN_GRACE_PERIOD" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="or"> <Expression> fn: timestampGreater (fn: timestampAdd(/Coupon/@StartDateActive, -/Coupon/DataCapture/@CouponGracePeriodInDays), /Coupon/Order/@PricingDate) </Expression> <Expression> fn: timestampGreater (/Coupon/Order/@PricingDate, fn: timestampAdd(/Coupon/@EndDateActive, /Coupon/DataCapture/@CouponGracePeriodInDays)) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.Description: Define approval conditions when item not on file is found.

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxNumberOfCouponsPerItem" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define Maximum number of Coupons for item.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="MAX_NUM_COUPON_FOR_ITEM" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression> fn: doubleGreater (/Item/@CouponsPerItem, /Item/DataCapture/@MaxNumberOfCouponsPerItem) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxNumberOfCouponsPerOrder" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define Maximum number of Coupons for order.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="MAX_NUM_COUPON_FOR_ORDER" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression> fn: doubleGreater (/Order/@CouponsInOrder, /Order/DataCapture/@MaxNumberOfCouponsPerOrder) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.Description: Define approval conditions for maximum quantity for an Item
Define approval conditions when mutual exclusivity excludes a coupon.

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxNegativeLineTotal" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="Currency" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define approval conditions when orderline total is negative
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="ORDER_LINE_NEGATIVE_TOTAL" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression>fn: doubleLesser (/OrderLine/LineOverallTotals/@LineTotal, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@MaxNegativeLineTotal) </Expression> <Expression> fn:equals (/OrderLine/Order/PriceInfo/@Currency, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@Currency) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxNegativeTotalAmount" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="Currency" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define approval conditions when order total is negative
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="ORDER_NEGATIVE_TOTAL" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression>fn: doubleLesser (/Order/OverallTotals/@GrandTotal, /Order/DataCapture/@MaxNegativeTotalAmount) </Expression> <Expression> fn:equals (/Order/PriceInfo/@Currency, /Order/DataCapture/@Currency) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="OfflineLimit" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="Currency" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="PaymentType" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="PaymentCardType" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Checks if the total amount of offline transactions exceed the limit.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="OFFLINE_LIMIT" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="and"> <Expression> fn:equals(/PaymentTypeAggregation/@Currency, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@Currency) </Expression> <Expression> fn: doubleGreater (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@OfflineTotal, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@OfflineLimit) </Expression> <Expression> fn: equals (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@PaymentType, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@PaymentType) </Expression> <Expression> fn: equals (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@PaymentCardType, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@PaymentCardType) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxOverridePercentage" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Ensures manual discounts/price overrides do not exceed a certain percentage of an item's price.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="ORDER_MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression> fn: doubleGreater(/OrderLine/LineOverallTotals/@ManualOverridePercentage, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@MaxOverridePercentage) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output/>"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="ChargeCategory" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="ChargeName" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="ChargePercentage" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="ItemCategoryPath" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="CustomerLevelAttribute" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Checks and apply restocking fee on an item.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="POS_RESTOCKING_FEE" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="or"> <Expression> fn:isVoid(/OrderLine/DataCapture/@ItemCategoryPath) </Expression> <Group op="and"> <Expression> fn:isVoid(/OrderLine/ItemDetails/CategoryList/Category[@CategoryPath=/OrderLine/DataCapture/@ItemCategoryPath]/@CategoryPath) </Expression> <Expression> fn:!compareAny(/OrderLine/ItemDetails/CategoryList/Category/@CategoryPath,stringBegins,fn:stringConcat(/OrderLine/DataCapture/@ItemCategoryPath,'/')) </Expression> </Group> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="or"> <Expression> fn:isVoid(/OrderLine/DataCapture/@CustomerLevelAttribute) </Expression> <Expression> fn:equals(/OrderLine/Order/Customer/@CustomerLevel, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@CustomerLevelAttribute) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" />"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="ReturnReasonAttribute" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Checks the return reason of the item being returned.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="RETURN_REASON_VALIDATION" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression> fn:equals(/OrderLine/@ReturnReason, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@ReturnReasonAttribute) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" />"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="MaxReturnUnitPriceLimit" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="Currency" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Checks if the unit price of the line exceeds the limit.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="RETURN_UNIT_PRICE_LIMIT" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="AND"> <Expression> fn:equals(/OrderLine/Order/PriceInfo/@Currency, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@Currency) </Expression> <Expression> fn:doubleGreater(/OrderLine/LineOverallTotals/@UnitPrice, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@MaxReturnUnitPriceLimit) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" />"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="CustomerLevelAttribute" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="ReturnWindowAttributePath" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define return window limits for returned items.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="POS_RETURN_WINDOW" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="and"> <Expression> fn: dateGreaterOrEqual (fn: dateAdd (/OrderLine/SalesOrder/@OrderDate, fn:evalXPath(/OrderLine/DataCapture/@ReturnWindowAttributePath)), /OrderLine/Order/@OrderDate) </Expression> <Group op="or"> <Expression> fn: isVoid (/OrderLine/DataCapture/@CustomerLevelAttribute) </Expression> <Expression> fn: equals (/OrderLine/Order/Customer/@CustomerLevel, /OrderLine/DataCapture/@CustomerLevelAttribute) </Expression> </Group> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" />"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.DataCapture: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <DataCapture> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="PaymentType" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="PaymentCardType" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="Double" Name="TenderLimit" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> <Attribute AttributeKey="200913854075" DataType="String" Name="Currency" OrganizationCode="DEFAULT"/> </DataCapture>
Validation.Description: Define total tender limits for a PaymentType and/or PaymentCardType.
Validation.PreDefinedGreexRule: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <PreDefinedGreexRule id="TENDER_LIMIT" returnType="PureXml"> <If> <Condition ConditionKey="2001458633983"> <Group op="and"> <Expression> fn:equals(/PaymentTypeAggregation/@Currency, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@Currency) </Expression> <Expression> fn: doubleGreater (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@TenderTotal, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@TenderLimit) </Expression> <Expression> fn: equals (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@PaymentType, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@PaymentType) </Expression> <Expression> fn: equals (/PaymentTypeAggregation/@PaymentCardType, /PaymentTypeAggregation/DataCapture/@PaymentCardType) </Expression> </Group> </Condition> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="Y" ApprovalRequired="Y"/>"/> </Return> </If> <Else> <Return> <Value output="<Output RulesApply="N" />"/> </Return> </Else> </PreDefinedGreexRule>

Validation.Description: Checks if the return line is blind.
Checks if the item is returnable.
